title: A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING FULL AND STRONG SUPPORT OF THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNIT OF LOS BANOS TO THE EFFORTS OF THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT OF LAGUNA THROUGH THE LEADERSHIP OF HON. MARISOL ”SOL” C. ARAGONES-SAMPELO IN COLLABORATION WITH THE SMC PRESIDENT RAMON ANG, TO SOLVE THE FLOODING PROBLEM OF LAGUNA PROVINCE THROUGH RIVER WIDENING AND DREDGING OF THE LAGUNA DE BAY.
